overview: Enjoy six brand new scenes featuring thirteen incredibly hot stars, all with the classic Rodney Moore mix of hot sex and side splitting humor he's famous for. Here's just a little taste of what Vampires has in store: Jail Incident: Poor Mandy. First she gets lost and ends up in hooker alley where both johns and pimps mistake her for a whore. Then she gets busted for hooking. Then she gets thrown in a cell by the sheriff where a real ho makes her lick
title: Vampires
